Text:
U r a truth ful man, 
u a pirate too
Dont cry

This is just a re-hash of an older torrent:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5568285/Old_books_on_vacuum_tubes_scanned_to_PDF

NO IT IS NOT A REHASH!!! There was a piratebay torrent, and a few of the books are from that torrent, but there are many other tube manuals. If you bothered to check out the files in the torrent, and even bothered to notice that this torrent is 1.72GB, where as the one you refer to is 775MB you might have noticed that. And if you read what I wrote, I don't even take credit for the original scans.

This torrent contains a lot of new material. Some are quite hard to find manuals that are, even to this day, sought after by ham radio amateurs.

So, shmeghead, thanks for sharing. Don't let those few fools harsh your buzz.
